title: Sketchbook Folio, "Apollo with Lyre, Fame, Abundance, Beauty and Two Putti on Clouds, Study after Marcantonio Franceschini", 1821–22
medium: Pen and brown ink, brown wash, over black chalk white heavy wove paper
inscribed: in pen and brown ink at lower left: 3 Franceschino Bologna
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Above, Apollo with lyre, sitting on cloud. At center and at left, three reclining nymphs or goddesses. One with book and trumpet, one with cornucopia, and one with mirror. Below, two winged putti, one holding short sword, and one putti with round shield.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "Apollo with Lyre, Fame, Abundance, Beauty and Two Putti on Clouds, Study after Marcantonio Franceschini", 1821–22.
1821–22. Pen and brown ink, brown wash, over black chalk white heavy wove paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3552.
